plot outline: The story revolves around the romance and relation between Rama and Janaki. Rama is a wrestler who's too shy to talk to women, while Janaki is a confident teacher. Their different mindset, upbringing and lifestyle makes their love story sweet and complicated at the same time.
title: Jodi Hakki
plot: The story revolves around the romance and relation between Rama and Janaki. Rama is a wrestler who's too shy to talk to women, while Janaki is a confident teacher. Their different mindset, upbringing and lifestyle makes their love story sweet and complicated at the same time.
